name: Tank Sudoku
description:
In Tank Sudoku you try to clear a randomly generated sudoku as fast as possible. Before you can complete the sudoku, you have to clear it of enemy tanks.
Beat 100 handcrafted levels filled with tanks with unique attacks.

Features

  • 100 different handcrafted levels
  • Randomly generated sudoku's
  • 7 different enemy tanks
  • Power up your tank with special shells

Game Modes

  • 4x4
  • 6x6
  • 9x9
  • Back 2 Back : Try to beat each level filled with tanks in 1 sitting.
